channel.title: Logs are only posting on one line as of the new patch - please revert this
channel.description:
As of the new patch, when you copy/paste logs it pastes only on one line, as opposed to multiple lines. For example, before this patch you could post these logs (below) and they would appear as you see them here John Smith - Physician N1 - Heal 3 | DNR N2 - Heal 4 | DNR
But with this new patch, logs are posting on only one line. So the above logs would appear as: John Smith - Physician N1 - Heal 3 | DNR N2 - Heal 4 | DNR
Logs appearing on only one line is extremely annoying, it makes other peoples logs hard to read if they post them in full, likewise, people are less likely to understand logs that you post.
Please revert log posting to the former example.
